scripts.start: npm run compile:go && npm run cp:workers && npm run cp-exec && react-scripts start
scripts.compile:go: npm run compile:two-opt && npm run compile:annealing && npm run compile:genetic
scripts.compile:two-opt: cd ./src/wasm_modules/two_opt &&  GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm tinygo build -o ../../../public/two_opt.wasm -target wasm ./main.go
scripts.compile:annealing: cd ./src/wasm_modules/annealing &&  GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm tinygo build -o ../../../public/annealing.wasm -target wasm ./main.go
scripts.compile:genetic: cd ./src/wasm_modules/genetic &&  GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm tinygo build -o ../../../public/genetic.wasm -target wasm ./main.go
scripts.cp:workers: npm run cp:annealing-worker && npm run cp:genetic-worker && npm run cp:two-opt-worker
